text:
Music Wonderland course for my 3-4yo.
Been an excellent wonderful experience. A great bonding experience between parent & child. Ms Maria as teacher is also very kind, encouraging, well-liked by all the children. Learning has been great too with a great curriculum. Thank you so much, YAMAHA!

My son has been attending this center for 2 years. The teacher is highly professional, and my son not only enjoys the lessons but also rapidly grasped playing the piano. The front counter staff is incredibly friendly, offering helpful advice on administrative and scheduling matters. Our experience has been truly awesome and pleasant.
Teacher Maria has been very patient in guiding the students..even with Kai Kai running around in the class. Thank you so much for the good experience and Kai Kai likes it.
My daughter goes to apple course, and the teacher is very patient and fun. Love our classes.

My two girls are attending Yamaha 1 to 1 class. My younger girl loves attending the music lessons and Teacher Chan is patient with her. Teacher Beatrice,  teaches the older kid, although strict with her, we are glad that she managed to pass Grade 2 after learning for quite a while due to COVID.
